title: **SOLD**: Sheckard (No Glove) Brown Hindu - SGC A
author: GaleClark23

posts.post_title: **SOLD**: Sheckard (No Glove) Brown Hindu - SGC A
posts.post_content:
**Sold**$165 

Payment via Paypal F/F.  
Free Shipping via USPS with tracking in a bubble envelope.  
“I’ll take it” takes precedent over any ongoing correspondence .
                           
The front has a few scratches with at least one that looks like a previous owner tried to fill it in.  Also a few surface wrinkles.  The back is really nice.....solid coloring, good centering, etc.  A great example of the Brown Hindu back.  Its time for me to move this along.
